bjt.1: evaṁ me sutaṁ, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye
bjt.2: tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi:
bjt.3: 'dve me bhikkhave, antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā.
bjt.4: yocayāṁ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṁhito, yo cāyaṁ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṁhito,
bjt.5: ete te bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
bjt.6: katamā ca sā bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati:
bjt.7: ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seyyathīdaṁ: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
bjt.8: ayaṁ kho sā bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
bjt.9: idaṁ kho pana bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ: jātipi dukkhā jarāpi dukkhā vyādhipi dukkho maraṇampi dukkhaṁ appiyehi sampayogo dukkho piyehi vippayogo dukkho yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ saṅkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā'.
bjt.10: idaṁ kho pana bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṁ: 'yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī, seyyathīdaṁ: kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā'.
bjt.11: idaṁ kho pana bhikkhave, dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṁ: yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.
bjt.12: idaṁ kho pana bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ: ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathīdaṁ: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
bjt.13: 'idaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccanti' me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.14: taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pariññeyyanti me bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.15: taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ pariññātanti me bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.16: 'idaṁ dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccanti' me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.17: taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṁ pahātabbanti me bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.18: taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṁ pahīnanti me bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.19: 'idaṁ dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti' me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.20: taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṁ sacchikātabbanti me bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.21: taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṁ sacchikatanti me bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.22: 'idaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccanti' me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.23: taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ bhāvetabbanti me bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.24: taṁ kho panidaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṁ bhāvitanti me bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
bjt.25: yāvakīvañca me bhikkhave, imesu catusu ariyasaccesu evaṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ dvādasākāraṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ na suvisuddhaṁ ahosi, neva tāvāhaṁ bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho paccaññāsiṁ.
bjt.26: yato ca kho me bhikkhave, imesu catusu ariyasaccesu evaṁ tiparivaṭṭaṁ dvādasākāraṁ yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ suvisuddhaṁ ahosi, athāhaṁ bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddho paccaññāsiṁ.
bjt.27: Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṁ udapādi akuppā me cetovimutti, ayamantimā jāti natthidāni punabbhavoti.
bjt.29: attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
bjt.30: imasamiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne āyasmato koṇḍaññassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi: 'yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbantaṁ nirodhadhammanti'.
bjt.31: pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā saddamanussāvesu: 'etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appativattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti'.
bjt.32: bhummānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā cātummahārājikā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ: 'etaṁ bhagavatā bārānasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appativattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti'.
bjt.33: cātummahārājikānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā tāvatiṁsā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ: 'etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appativattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti'.
bjt.34: tāvatiṁsānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā yāmā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ: 'etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appativattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti'.
bjt.35: yāmānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā tusitā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ: 'etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appativattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti'.
bjt.36: tusitānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā nimmāṇaratī devā saddamanussāvesuṁ: 'etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appativattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti'.
bjt.37: tusitānaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā paranimmitavasavattī devā saddamanussāvesuṁ: 'etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appativattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti'.
bjt.38: paranimmitavasavattīnaṁ devānaṁ saddaṁ sutvā brahmakāyikā devā saddamanussāvesuṁ: 'etaṁ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṁ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ appativattiyaṁ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti'.
bjt.39: itiha tena khaṇena tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggañchi.
bjt.40: ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi.
bjt.41: appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi: atikkamma devānaṁ devānubhāvanti.
bjt.42: atha kho bhagavā udānaṁ udānesi: 'aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño, aññāsi vata bho koṇḍaññoti'.
bjt.43: itihidaṁ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa aññākoṇḍaññottheva nāmaṁ ahosīti.

pts.1: Evam me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayam Bhagavā Bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati Isipatane Migadāye.
pts.2: Tatra kho Bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi.
pts.3: Dve me bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevittabbā, Katame dve.
pts.4: Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmesu khallikānuyogo hīno gammo puthujjanīko anariyo anatthasaṃhito, yo cāyam attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito.
pts.5: Ete te, bhikkhave ubho ante anupakamma majjhimā paṭipadā Tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
pts.6: Katamā ca sā bhikkhave majjhimā paṭipadā Tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
pts.7: Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathīdaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
pts.8: Ayam kho sā bhikkhave majjhimā paṭipadā Tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhuº ñaṇaº karaṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
pts.9: Idaṃ kho pana bhikkhave dukkham ariyasaccaṃ. Jāti pi dukkhā jarā pi dukkhā vyādhi pi dukkhā maraṇam pi dukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā pi dukkhā, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yam picchaṃ na labhati tam pi dukkhaṃ, saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā pi dukkhā.
pts.10: Idam kho pana bhikkhave dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccaṃ. Yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandī rāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī, seyyathīdaṃ. Kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā.
pts.11: Idaṃ kho pana bhikkhave dukkhanirodham ariyasaccaṃ. Yo tassā yeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.
pts.12: Idaṃ kho pana bhikkhave dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccam. Ayam eva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo ║ seyyathīdaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi, la-pe, sammāsamādhi.
pts.13: Idaṃ dukkham ariyasaccan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
pts.14: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkham ariyasaccam pariññeyyan ti me bhikkhave pubbe, la,
pts.15: pariññātan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi, pe, āloko udapādi.
pts.16: Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
pts.17: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam pahātabban ti me bhikkhave pubbe, la-pe,
pts.18: pahīnan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ║ pe, āloko udapādi.
pts.19: Idaṃ dukkhanirodham ariyasaccan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
pts.20: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodham ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban ti me bhikkhave pubbe, la-pe,
pts.21: sacchikatan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi, pe, āloko udapādi.
pts.22: Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
pts.23: Tam kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccam bhāvetabban ti me bhikkhave, pa ║
pts.24: bhāvitan ti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapādi ñāṇam udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
pts.25: Yāva kīvañca me bhikkhave imesu catusu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaḍassanaṃ na suvisuddham ahosi, neva tāvāham bhikkhave sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhim abhisambuddho ti paccaññāsiṃ.
pts.26: Yato ca kho me bhikkhave imesu catusu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭam dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtam ñāṇadassanaṃ suvisuddham ahosi, athāham bhikkhave sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaram sammāsambodhim abhisambuddho ti paccaññāsiṃ,
pts.27: ñāṇañca pana me dassanam udapādi Akuppā me cetovimutti ayam antimā jāti natthidāni punabbhavo ti.
pts.29: attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū Bhagavato bhāsitam abhinanduṃ,
pts.30: imasmiṃ ca pana veyyākaraṇasmim bhaññamāne āyasmato Koṇḍaññassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhum udapādi, yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabban taṃ nirodhadhamman ti.
pts.31: Evam pavattite ca pana Bhagavatā dhammacakke Bhummā devā saddam anussāvesuṃ. Etam Bhagavatā Bārāṇasiyam Isipatane Migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkam pavattitaṃ appativattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā Mārena vā Brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin ti.
pts.32: Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā Cātummahārājikā devā saddam anussāvesuṃ. Etam Bhagavatā Bārāṇasiyam Isipatane Migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkam pavattitam appativattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā Mārena vā Brahmuṇā vā kenaci vā lokasmin ti.
pts.38: Paranimmittavasavattino devā Brahmakāyikā devā saddam anussāvesuṃ. Etam Bhagavatā Bārāṇasiyaṃ Isipatane Migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkam pavattitaṃ appativattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vāMārena vā Brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin ti.
pts.39: Iti ha tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttena yāva Brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi,
pts.40: ayañ ca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi,
pts.41: appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pātur ahosi atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvan ti.
pts.42: Atha kho Bhagavā udānam udānesi. Aññāsi vata bho {Koṇḍañño} aññāsi vata bho Koṇḍañño ti.
pts.43: Iti hidam āyasmato Koṇḍaññassa Aññāta-Koṇḍañño tveva nāmam ahosī ti.

wte.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye.
wte.2: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi:
wte.4: Katame dve? Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāma­su­khal­li­kānu­yogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṃhito, yo cāyaṃ atta­kila­mathā­nuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito.
wte.5: Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
wte.6: Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
wte.7: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ—sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
wte.8: Ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
wte.9: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ—saṃkhittena pañcu­pādā­nak­khan­dhā dukkhā.
wte.10: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, duk­kha­sa­muda­yaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavik nandi­rāga­saha­gatā tatra­tat­rā­bhinan­dinī, seyyathidaṃ—kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā.
wte.11: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesa­virāga­nirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo.
wte.12: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, duk­kha­nirodha­gāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ— ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ—sammādiṭṭhi … pe … sammāsamādhi.
wte.13: ‘Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
wte.14: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe … pe … udapādi.
wte.15: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññātan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
wte.16: ‘Idaṃ duk­kha­sa­muda­yaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
wte.17: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ duk­kha­sa­muda­yaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe … pe … udapādi.
wte.18: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ duk­kha­sa­muda­yaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahīnan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
wte.19: ‘Idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
wte.20: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe … pe … udapādi.
wte.21: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikatan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
wte.22: ‘Idaṃ duk­kha­nirodha­gāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
wte.23: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ duk­kha­nirodha­gāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe … pe … udapādi.
wte.24: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ duk­kha­nirodha­gāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvitan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
wte.25: Yāvakīvañca me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ na suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake ­sassama­ṇab­rāhma­ṇiyā pajāya sade­va­manus­sāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
wte.26: Yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake ­sassama­ṇab­rāhma­ṇiyā pajāya sade­va­manus­sāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
wte.27: Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
wte.29: Attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
wte.30: Imasmiñca pana vey­yāka­ra­ṇas­miṃ bhaññamāne āyasmato koṇḍaññassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi: “yaṃ kiñci samuda­ya­dhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman”ti.
wte.31: Pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā sad­da­manus­sā­vesuṃ: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
wte.32: Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikā devā sad­da­manus­sā­vesuṃ: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ, appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
wte.38: para­nimmita­vasavattī devā … pe … brahmakāyikā devā sad­da­manus­sā­vesuṃ: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
wte.39: Itiha tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi.
wte.41: appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvanti.
wte.42: Atha kho bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi: “aññāsi vata bho, koṇḍañño, aññāsi vata bho, koṇḍañño”ti.
wte.43: Iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa “aññāsikoṇḍañño” tveva nāmaṃ ahosīti.

vri.1: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye|
vri.2: tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi –
vri.4: katame dve? yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṃhito, yo cāyaṃ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito|
vri.5: ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati’’|
vri.6: ‘‘katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
vri.7: ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi|
vri.8: ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati|
vri.9: ‘‘idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ – jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ – saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā|
vri.10: idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ – yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandirāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṃ – kāmataṇhā, bhavataṇhā, vibhavataṇhā|
vri.11: idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ – yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo|
vri.12: idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ – ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi…pe.… sammāsamādhi|
vri.13: ‘‘‘idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasacca’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi|
vri.14: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyya’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe…pe.… udapādi|
vri.15: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññāta’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi|
vri.16: ‘‘‘idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasacca’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi|
vri.17: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabba’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe…pe.… udapādi|
vri.18: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahīna’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi|
vri.19: ‘‘‘idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasacca’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi|
vri.20: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabba’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe…pe.… udapādi|
vri.21: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikata’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi|
vri.22: ‘‘‘idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi|
vri.23: taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabba’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe…pe.… udapādi|
vri.24: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvita’nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi|
vri.25: ‘‘yāvakīvañca me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ na suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ |
vri.26: ‘‘yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ|
vri.27: ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādi – ‘akuppā me vimutti , ayamantimā jāti, natthidāni punabbhavo’’’ti|
vri.29: attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti|
vri.30: imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne āyasmato koṇḍaññassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi – ‘‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma’’nti|
vri.31: pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke bhummā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ – ‘‘etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmi’’nti|
vri.32: bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ – ‘‘etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ, appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmi’’nti|
vri.38: paranimmitavasavattī devā…pe.… brahmakāyikā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ – ‘‘etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmi’’nti|
vri.39: itiha tena khaṇena (tena layena) tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi|
vri.41: appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvanti|
vri.42: atha kho bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi – ‘‘aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño, aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño’’ti!
vri.43: iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa ‘aññāsikoṇḍañño’ tveva nāmaṃ ahosīti| paṭhamaṃ|
